claim: Fewer than 20% of players are under 180 cm with an overall strength above 70.
extra_info: percentage refers to DIVIDE(COUNT(height < 180 AND overall_rating > 70),COUNT(id)) * 100
reasoning: The percentage of players under 180 cm with overall_rating > 70 is approximately 13.9% (row-level) or 17.6% (distinct players). Both are fewer than 20%, confirming the claim.

CREATE TABLE `Player` (
	`id`	INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
	`player_api_id`	INTEGER UNIQUE,
	`player_name`	TEXT,
	`player_fifa_api_id`	INTEGER UNIQUE,
	`birthday`	TEXT,
	`height`	INTEGER,
	`weight`	INTEGER
);

content.text: Good. The `Player` table has `height` and `id`, and `Player_Attributes` has `overall_rating`. The hint says "overall strength" maps to `overall_rating`. Now let me compute the percentage per the hint's formula.

input.command:
sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claimdb/test_dbs/european_football_2.sqlite" "
SELECT 
  COUNT(CASE WHEN P.height < 180 AND PA.overall_rating > 70 THEN 1 END) AS numerator,
  COUNT(P.id) AS denominator,
  CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN P.height < 180 AND PA.overall_rating > 70 THEN 1 END) AS REAL) / COUNT(P.id) * 100 AS percentage
FROM Player P
INNER JOIN Player_Attributes PA ON P.player_api_id = PA.player_api_id;
"
input.description: Calculate percentage of players under 180cm with overall_rating > 70

content.text:
The percentage is approximately **13.94%**, which is indeed fewer than 20%.

Let me also check if the hint intended us to use distinct players rather than all player-attribute rows:

input.command:
sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claimdb/test_dbs/european_football_2.sqlite" "
SELECT 
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN P.height < 180 AND PA.overall_rating > 70 THEN P.id END) AS numerator,
  COUNT(DISTINCT P.id) AS denominator,
  CAST(COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN P.height < 180 AND PA.overall_rating > 70 THEN P.id END) AS REAL) / COUNT(DISTINCT P.id) * 100 AS percentage
FROM Player P
INNER JOIN Player_Attributes PA ON P.player_api_id = PA.player_api_id;
"

content.text:
With distinct players, the percentage is approximately **17.59%**, which is still fewer than 20%.

Both interpretations (row-level and distinct players) yield a percentage under 20%. The claim states "Fewer than 20% of players are under 180 cm with an overall strength above 70," and the data confirms this.
